sentences.translation: 手下：是的，是的，所有的摇篮。

sentences.sentence: But it seems that the only line of communication that has not changed is between boss and underling.
sentences.translation: 但看上去唯一没有改变的，就是老板与下属的沟通方式。

sentences.sentence: Our healthy participants had a basically accurate visual image of their own body, but the brain's model of the hand underling position sense was highly distorted.
sentences.translation: 我们的健康参与者有一个对于自身身体基本精确的视觉图像，但是大脑对于手的下属方位感模型却高度失真。
